Reviews.Title: NICE!
Reviews.Author: Melly
Reviews.Content: Looks fake but far away looks sooooo real! really cheap but worth 3 dollars 99 cents lol... anyways this need 3 AA batterys and this thing is motion senser so when someone walks by the thing moves left to right and blinks a red light really cute!

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: jigger master
Reviews.Content: this is a blessed lil camera and keeps my kids feeling nervous all day while I relax in my house. Knowing this is there keeps them doing their homework.

Reviews.Title: Good Decoy
Reviews.Author: Jake
Reviews.Content: I was having trouble with people stealing off of my porch. Since I set up this fake camera nothing has been touched.

Reviews.Title: Reasonably good
Reviews.Author: H.Osment
Reviews.Content: I found this camera works well if you can avoid too close of a observation on it.I gave the camera fake 4 stars out of five as I will explain after a bit of explanation why the camera purchaises: To begin the narrative I would say I happen to live in a fairly conservative, nice, type neigborhood where kids were safe riding their bikes and the neighbors all knew each other and their kids but over the last year we started to have problems with certain undesirables who were crossing through our neighborhood with their baggy pants, do-rags and boom boxs and jiven their way through to their next drug deal or to see their probation officer in a office suite half a mile away.Intially we tried posting No Tresspassing signs but they soon stole these. Sadly,these bums weren't only eye and noise pollution but break in's were going on during the day and women were feeling scared as these guys would intentioningly block traffic by walking as slow as possible down the middle of the street and making obscene gestures and bang on the cars if they tried to get around them.Then there were the night disturbances of them getting into fights late at night with the other jive-times they ran into. At first, the nice citzens in our neighborhood seemed beside themselves until we realized the police and probation were probably looking for some of them so the last thing they wanted was to be filmed! We ordered seven of these cameras and got them mounted high-I mean on top of roofs and up by telephone poles where you could see them from the ground but not close up and where they couldn't be gotten at.A few neighbors had real video cameras to film them with but mostly we used dummy cams like the above and the undesirables were soon driven off though for a while it was funny watching them trying to pull up their hoodies to cover their faces or attempt to find ways to move up the street without being "filmed". One neighbor told me the last time he saw them he heard some of them treking through our neighborhood around 11pm at night saying "Dem damn mo foes habs stuck cameras every werez". Happy to say, these cameras have done the job-the traffic was rerouted and we have a neighborhood that looks more like the Brady Brunch neighborhood than than a neighborhood in Detroit. So this brings back to the four stars versus the five stars. Four stars because the cameras worked for us in our neighborhood but no five stars because the camera was no good if closer observation was made of it-this could be a pain because it meant all of them had to be put up on our roofs which could be a pain. If one doesn't mind that,the camera is great but if that is not an option skip the camera and buy something more realistic looking.

Reviews.Title: Super cheapee, but worth it.
Reviews.Author: Jill Johnson
Reviews.Content: A cop stopped by the shop so ask for my video. As he'd thought it was real, hopefully so will potential burglars, so it's worth the super inexpensive price. My only gripe is to myself, and that I want to start being careful to buy only American products as (can you guess?>) I'm American and our economy needs everyone (me, too!) to do their part to help our situation.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price and its intended purpose.
Reviews.Author: Kram "Low Carb Diet is the way to go!"
Reviews.Content: This fake camera looks fake in closed distance. All fake cameras look fake, because they are fake camera. Since no one in bad intention will risk being recorded to examine a camera, all fake cameras serve their purpose by looking like a camera in far away. Most person with bad intention will easily pick  a place without cameras. For $4.02, I can afford to put as many fake cameras up as I want.

Reviews.Title: A good decoy
Reviews.Author: V. Davis "Creator of http://antibunny.com"
Reviews.Content: It works day or night, indoor our outdoor, and the batteries last forever, and the movement, blinking light, and slight noise of the motor are good attention getters to make would be burglars think twice.  They're really best if you also have a few real security cameras better hidden.

Reviews.Title: Looks Real
Reviews.Author: auggie doggie
Reviews.Content: Looks Real to me! Hopefully any suspicious thieves will have the same opinion! Good price and easy to install. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Fake surveillance camera
Reviews.Author: mattie73
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these for my sister who has been having a problem with her neighbors.  She loves them.  The cameras appear real if someone doesn't get too close.

Reviews.Title: Excellent little replica
Reviews.Author: Anita
Reviews.Content: Excellent little replica and it does exactly  what I wanted it to do.The price was reasonable and shipping was fast with secure packaging.Thanks for the good customer service.

Reviews.Title: fake camera
Reviews.Author: dancinsue
Reviews.Content: The red blinking light goes off only on a very small range of detection.  Then it stops at the very extreme end of the range of detection and thus misses most of what it was put there for.  It works, but doesn't work well

Reviews.Title: Product is as described
Reviews.Author: goodfela
Reviews.Content: The product is as shown and  as described.  It is just for show to scare of any would be intruders.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: janice
Reviews.Content: It is a very nice product. It looks real. It was easy to assemble. It looked just like the picture on Amazon

Reviews.Title: really cool
Reviews.Author: blackskull28
Reviews.Content: this camera is really cool, it has a sencer which works off of light, when it's triggered the thing moves left to right and blinks a red light. it requires 3 double A batteries.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Johnny
Reviews.Content: Really good quality fake security cameras especially for the price. Electronic and moves too with a blinking red light but i don't prefer turning it on because it looks for real without it.

Reviews.Title: Obviously Fake
Reviews.Author: DaByuBoy
Reviews.Content: The problem with this fake camera is that it has been around so long and advertised in so many places as being a "dummy camera" you are not going to fool anyone anymore.  I had these up about 8 years ago before they were mainstream.  I replaced them with more realistic dome cameras. You can do much much better as for as dummy cameras go.

Reviews.Title: HAHAHAHAHahaha!
Reviews.Author: Thomas Stromberg
Reviews.Content: The camera is a deal at twice the price. The real value is if you actually install this in a doorway where people will see it, so that they can laugh at how terribly fake looking this is. The only way it could look more fake is if there was a sticker that said 'FAKE!'. That said, it's hanging at the entrance to my apartment right now, just as an ice breaker for guests. The mount and rotation bracket are about as cheap as you would expect from a free gift from Cracker Jack box. The plastic looks even more fake than the Amazon photo portends, and has an appearance more akin to a Happy Meal representation of a 1950's robot. Also, don't expect the camera to 'follow' the subject. It simply bobs it's head around for a couple of cycles once it detects "something".

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!
Reviews.Author: Criss "Criss"
Reviews.Content: I do not like this product. It does not look real and the writing is not on the camera itself, it is on stickers that have been placed on the camera. Also, it is supposed to be montion sensored, the motion sensor does not work. It just kept moving from one side to the other when no one was even around. I do not recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Camera looked Fake
Reviews.Author: Freytag
Reviews.Content: To me this camera looked fake. To be fair I never took it out of the package and tried it. My 1st impression was it looked fake so I sent it back.

Reviews.Title: Great Seller
Reviews.Author: Terri Gibson
Reviews.Content: Item was just as described! The motion detector is not that great, however it looks real just hanging on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Not worth it
Reviews.Author: Judy Ellsworth
Reviews.Content: These cameras look great. . .but they are supposed to have a motion detection system!  They so if you want a system that detects motion from 0" to 12". . .but no further!!!  We wanted to put them on the walls in a retail business, but they didn't move unless the motion was less than a foot from the front of the camera.  We returned them as they were useless to us and bought a "real" system that actually works like it is supposed to.

Reviews.Title: Cameras
Reviews.Author: patricia bishop, Spirit of Gold Beach
Reviews.Content: Very nice quality.  Do not look fake at all. Motion senser works as stated.  Batteries last along time because of the senser activation. Pleased with the product.

Reviews.Title: Looks real.
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: I purchased these to add to my already existing security system for my retirement place out in the country.  They really help deter break ins.  I would recommend this product to security.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: amanda
Reviews.Content: Works very welleven fooled my soon to be step son whose always getting into trouble.now he thinks im always watching

Reviews.Title: Good price.
Reviews.Author: Scott Meyers
Reviews.Content: Bought for a Geocaching project and am happy with it.  Better then I expected for such a low price.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Very realistic indeed! ...
Reviews.Author: BlackPudding
Reviews.Content: This was a good investment.  It is indeed very realistic.  Unfortunately batteries don't last long and if the units are placed near the eaves to maintain the realistic look, it's very annoying to change the batteries.  However, the unit's red indicator light blinks and it swivels when detecting motion which is awesome.  In other words it works as advertised and made a good substitute for the expensive real cameras for my purposes.  I placed one near the front door which made it more accessible for changing the batteries.

Reviews.Title: No sensitivity!
Reviews.Author: Paul Kacprzak
Reviews.Content: I got this to wart off a neighbor. It looks good But! its a motion detector that swivels L toR when something sets it off.You hav to wave your hand in ft of the lens to get it to work. Sometimes it will work normally but not very often. It still serves a purpose.

Reviews.Title: not waterproof but sort of works
Reviews.Author: Buddha LLC
Reviews.Content: well sort of does what it says.  put under eave and it does rotate around but a little inconsistent.  cheap plastic, don't know if it's going to fool anyone.

Reviews.Title: looks real
Reviews.Author: robert christian
Reviews.Content: fools most people and they still think real even after they see it.  they are outside with batteries and work well

Reviews.Title: Great Little Fakers!
Reviews.Author: Faerieblood
Reviews.Content: This little guys may be light weight when you hold them- but up on the side of my house they look great! Great buy!!!

Reviews.Title: took awhile to get here but for $4 this is the best fake camera out there. at least that ive ever seen
Reviews.Author: anonymous
Reviews.Content: looks real as real gets and would certainly fool me if i was a thief. now maybe pesky little hooligan children wont steal bikes from my garage anymore haha

Reviews.Title: se fake surveillance camera with sensor
Reviews.Author: watches "enthusiast"
Reviews.Content: functional,look fake cause it is fake,but works as described,for the price it does what it supposed to do, would recommand it to anyone who needs one.

Reviews.Title: not such a great product
Reviews.Author: roush family
Reviews.Content: i like when i first got it now it use`s alot of battiers and i stater to hate it cause it was costing more money for battier`s and i even bought 90-300 battier`s you know them big pack`s of them i got three big pack`s and with in five week`s i went through all my battier`s ad they are not weather proof either

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Esteban Mendez
Reviews.Content: Looks very good. The package was not big! Points for that! Save the environment! The motion sensor is based in light changes, but seems to work good.

Reviews.Title: They are ok
Reviews.Author: James Watson
Reviews.Content: They look real from a distance, but once you get up close to them they are easy to tell they are fake.  also if you tighten the screws down even just a bit too tight it will crack the base of it.

Reviews.Title: like a toy
Reviews.Author: Tonie
Reviews.Content: Of couse with the price you can not expect too much, It looks like a toy, For the camera to detect the move, it should be very near.It's something funy, that`s all.

ProductInfo.Features:
Realistic movement and appearance. Colors may vary.
2 screws and 2 drywall anchors included.
Motion detection sensor turns on camera and light and starts the camera's panning motion.
Camera movement shuts off after a few minutes and reactivates when it senses motion.
A great crime deterrent at an affordable price!
ProductInfo.Name: Realistic Looking Mock Surveillance Camera w/Sensor-Motion Detection & Swivel Action
